caption.p: Fluid-attenuated inversion recovery (FLAIR) mages show diffuse confluent white matter hyperintensity particularly at the left-side (A-D) without significant enhancement on T1-weighted brain MRI (C, F). Involvement of (black arrow), deep gray matter (black arrowhead), and dorsal midbrain (white arrow) is evident. From Abdi S et al. [ 123]
